Dialogue.Page: The Stranger's Inhabitants once lived on a lush, green moon, which they destroyed to reach The Eye.
Luckily, one individual stepped up and brought their dormant home back to life, and even repopulated the species!
Hundreds of thousands of years later, they still live in harmony in a stagnant paradise, while doing everything to make sure they don't lose their home again.
After destroying a Nomai Vessel and its clan, other Nomai clans reacted by putting a no-warp zone around our solar neighborhood.
I even convinced Cypress, the current leader of the Strangers' Homeworld, to come with me to The Eye!
